summary:
A ring that regenerates your health, stamina, magicka and 50% shout cooldown + 100 resist damage.
Requires Version 1.8 Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Updated Mod from Kullashaker Deathless Ring with Permission.
This contain only 1 esp. No scripts, No worries. Your save is safe.

Enchantments:
50% Faster All Shout Cool Down
100 Resist Damage
Fast Magicka and Stamina Replenishing
Fast Healing Rate while in Combat 
(You can be slain if you don\'t escape. The best way is hide/escape while your Health regenerate and return to combat. Required difficulty: MASTER)


Can only be forge at Skyforge in Whiterun

Requires:
1 Daedra Heart
1 Scroll of Fast Healing
1 Diamond
1 Flawless Diamond

Installation:
Use NMM for better or Manual

Load Order:
Anywhere or Place it at the end if doesn\'t work.

Download STATUS by Mannygt to see the rating of your skills, attributes and others.

If you think this item is overpowered tell me and i will make 
some adjustments.

Requirement(s):
Skyrim 1.8+
author: fruitcake
